name: Easy Honey-Mustard Chicken and Potato Bake
author: 440DartRacer
summary: This easy-to-prepare and delicious meal is both sweet and savory, with a hint of honey and mustard combining chicken thighs and potatoes.
ingredients: 3 pounds red potatoes, unpeeled and diced into 3/4-inch cubes
directions: Whisk broth, honey, yellow mustard, mustard powder, garlic powder, onion powder, rosemary, salt, and black pepper together in a large mixing bowl until well blended
Add chicken, potatoes, and onion and stir until well coated
Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Transfer chicken to the prepared baking dish
Cover chicken with potatoes and pour remaining liquid on top
Bake in the preheated oven until potatoes are golden brown and chicken is no longer pink at the bone and juices run clear, about 50 minutes
